title: Romania - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Romania stands at BBB- with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Romania was last set at Baa3 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Romania was last reported at BBB- with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Romania thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Romania as reported by major credit rating agencies.
